Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.jmolViewer

Class Jmol3dBoxController

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.jmolViewer.base.Jmol3dController
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.jmolViewer.Jmol3dBoxController
public class Jmol3dBoxController extends Jmol3dController
Controller class for the DpdJmolViewer.
Author:
Andreas Truszkowski

  • Method Details

    • getSlabImageQuiet

      public BufferedImage getSlabImageQuiet(JmolSlabSettings aSlabSettings) throws Exception
      Gets an image of the current scene state with given slab settings. The size is equal to the rendering panel.
      Parameters:
      aSlabSettings - Slab settings
      Returns:
      Image of the scene
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception

    • getSlabImageQuiet

      Gets an image of the current scene state with given slab settings.
      Parameters:
      aSlabSettings - Slab settings
      aWidth - Width of the image
      aHeight - Height of the image
      Returns:
      Image of the scene.
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception

    • getStepImageQuiet

      public BufferedImage getStepImageQuiet(int aStep, int aWidth, int aHeight) throws Exception
      Renders given simulation step in the background.
      Parameters:
      aStep - Simulation step to render. (0,1,2,...)
      aWidth - Width of the image.
      aHeight - Height of the image.
      Returns:
      Box image of given simulation step.
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception

      public void showSingleStepBox(IGraphicalParticlePosition[] aData, String aFinalScript)
      Displays DPD data for a single simulation box.
      Parameters:
      aData - DPD data.
      aFinalScript - Script which is directly executed before the simulation box becomes visible.

    • showMultiStepBox

      public void showMultiStepBox(File aDpdFile, IGraphicalParticle[] aGraphicalParticles) throws ZipException, IOException
      Displays DPD data for a multi step simulation. As source serves a DPD result Zip file.
      Parameters:
      aDpdFile - Dpd result Zip file. All Data from the "Steps" folder will be visualised.
      aGraphicalParticles - Graphical particle data.
      Throws:
      ZipException - ZipException
      IOException - IOException
